Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 131st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1975...
Injured on 4/22/1975 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/11/1978 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1979 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 5/11/1980...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/29/1985 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1986, winning 2 games with a 2.81 ERA...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/1988 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/15/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $16,750,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1990, going 5-0, 1.75...
Injured on 8/19/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/25/1990 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1990, going 4-1, 1.12...
Injured on 5/17/1991 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $324,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1992, going 4-0, 0.81...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/1/1993 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/17/1993 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
